description: BLOCK:LOUNGE returns to open the new year at Consensus Hong Kong 2026 with GRVT, bringing together global builders, traders, investors, and ecosystem partners for a full-day Web3 social trading experience. Venue: Space Club Date: Wed, Feb 11, 2026 Time: 1:00 7:00 PM (GMT 8) What to Expect Live DEMOTrading Competition Powered by GRVT: An esports-style trading showdown featuring top traders competing live on Grvt. Real Strategies in Action: Watch professional traders execute, manage risk, and adapt in real time. High-Quality Networking: Connect with global founders, VCs, traders, and KOLs from across the ecosystem. Early-Stage Tools & Market Narratives: Discover emerging platforms, strategies, and trends before they hit the mainstream. Evening Social Session: Unwind, celebrate the competition, and build new relationships. Who Should Join Founders & Operators Web3 & AI Builders Traders & Market Participants VCs, Funds & Ecosystem Partners Communities & KOLs Come network, compete, discover, and celebrate the next chapter of Web3 in Hong Kong.
